title: how do you accept queue
body:
"You have declined too many games in a row. Be sure that you're ready to play before you enter the queue or you may face a penalty."

I keep clicking accept. It goes to waiting for other players. Now I've got this warning showing up. WTF rito?

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be experiencing an issue with maintaining a solid connection to our matchmaking servers. This could be caused by incompatible network settings on your local end, so I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure that's not the case.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.

Well, my network settings haven't changed in quite some time, but I'll be happy to run the hextech repair tool and see what it comes up with.  It's also inconsistent, in that one out of every 4 attempts goes through. I understand that inconsistent results make it harder to diagnose, but this is a problem widely seen on the stickied reddit bug thread for the new client.
